mapper.insert:
insert into tq_mobile.md_file(file_name, conversation_id, file_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.fileName}, #{entity.conversationId}, #{entity.fileId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

insert into tq_mobile.md_file(file_name, conversation_id, file_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.fileName}, #{entity.conversationId}, #{entity.fileId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})
on duplicate key update file_name = values(file_name) , conversation_id = values(conversation_id) , file_id = values(file_id) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , is_deleted = values(is_deleted)
